Stat 5, Winter 2021

Published Jan 14, 2022
Scootering around Pai, Thailand. Taken by Bas Glaap (@basglaap on insta).

This page is for students in my discussion sections & also for students taking the class generally!
The instructor for this class was Prof. Katznelson.

Step-by-Step Guides to Hypothesis Testing

  • For population proportion
  • For Difference of two proportions & Goodness of Fit (worksheet 9 solutions)

Discussion Slides

All the photos in these slides were taken by me (or a friend).

  • Week 2 Slides: Variable Types/Sampling Methods
  • Week 3 Slides: Histograms, Percentiles, Mean/Median
  • Week 4 Slides: Probability Basics
  • Week 5 Slides: Discrete Random Variables
  • Week 6 Slides: Discrete & Continuous Random Variables
  • Week 7 Slides: Normal Distribution Review & CLT
  • Week 8 Slides: Conf. Intervals & Hypothesis testing
  • Week 9 Slides: More Complicated Hypothesis Tests
  • Week 10 Slides: Tests of Independence & Linear Regression

Resources
